Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes the commissioner of general services to transfer and convey certain state land to the Syosset central school district
Summary: Authorizes the commissioner of general services to transfer and convey certain state land to the Syosset Central School District for the purpose of building new and expanding current facilities at Berry Hill Elementary School.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the commissioner of general services to transfer and convey certain state land to the Syosset central school district
